attributes.action: Increase tax on foreign companies, with no production unites in the UK, by 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that companies of foreign origin should not be allowed to take advantage of the strong British pound. Many companies sell items of high prices in the UK whilst taking advantage of labor from third world countries. We therefore want the prime minister to increase taxes on companies that sell goods in the UK, but have no production facalties in the UK.
